ga}V077@K/}yrI_xs#WH.text: Since there is 6 digits in a number that has a digit (other than zero) in the hundred thousands place, this checks if there is 6 digits in the $$$ variable. If there is, it changes the costume to the FIRST digit of the variable. If not, that means the number is less than 100,000, so it changes the costume to 0.  (I won't explain the other numbers' scirpts, because they are similar to this one. Just ask me if you don't understand ;)
